title: An Afternoon Picnic
description: Grab some fresh air and sprawl out at your local park
whatYouNeed: A blanket, a deck of cards, and a snack spread to boot

title: A Day on the Water
description: Rent a paddleboard or a kayak and head to a nearby lake or reservoir and catch some vitamin D
whatYouNeed: Water vessel rentals, sunscreen, and swim suits

title: Watch the Sun Go Down
description: Hit the road to find a good parking spot with a view and cuddle up while you watch the sunset
whatYouNeed: A good blanket and folding chairs

title: Outdoor Concert
description: Find a summer concert series and get your groove on with your loved one

title: Head Out For A Ride
description: Rent a mountain bike or a cruiser bike and head out for a few hours of quality time
whatYouNeed: A backpack packed with snack, sunscreen, or an ice cream shop in mind to hit on the way home!

title: Backpacking, Camping, or Glamping
description: Make it an overnight and find solitude in nature
whatYouNeed: A tent, sleeping bag, sleeping pad, cook set, and a water filter
